channel.title: PowerFX on Tech Tweedie
channel.description: Recent content in PowerFX on Tech Tweedie

item.title: Clone with PowerFX Command button
item.description: Introduction Cloning multiple records within a data view in a Model-Driven App is a common request from end users. It helps them quickly fill out data fields in situations where only a few values differ between records. In this blog post, we will explore how to add a custom button to the command bar in a Power Apps model-driven application to duplicate multiple records. Power Apps recently introduced this helpful feature, and the best part is that it can be achieved using Power FX, the same language used for developing canvas apps.
